text: Erin McDougald is a jazz vocalist. Her album Outside the Soirée featured Tom Harrell on trumpet and flugelhorn, and Dave Liebman on soprano and tenor saxophones. McDougald wrote the arrangements for the album. ==Discography== * Meeting Place (self-release, 2005) * Outside the Soiree (Miles High, 2017) == References == ==External links== * Official site * Article at the Chicago Tribune * "Young Singer Shares Love of Jazz", Article at Chicago Sun Times ==External links== * YouTube channel Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American female jazz singers Category:American jazz singers Category:Swing singers Category:Torch singers Category:20th-century American singers Category:20th-century American women singers Category:21st-century American singers Category:21st-century American women singers
title: Erin McDougald
